params.addr: The address for which to set the patch fee
params.baseFee: The patch fee to be set in wei

params.allowUserAssign: Boolean indicating whether user assignments are allowed
params.allowUserPatch: Boolean indicating whether user patches are allowed
params.requireWhitelist: Boolean indicating whether whitelist is required

withdraw(string,uint256).details: must be owner of scope or banker of scope to calltransfers to the msg.sender

params.amount: The amount to be withdrawn in wei

params.balance: The amount to be withdrawn in wei

addBanker(string,address).notice: Add a banker to a given scope

addOperator(string,address).notice: Add an operator to a scope

addProtocolBanker(address).notice: Add a banker to the protocol

addWhitelist(string,address).notice: Add an address to a scope's whitelist

applyTransfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Apply transfer rules and actions of a specific token from one address to another

assign(address,uint256,address,uint256).notice: Assigns a relation to have an IPatchworkLiteRef form a LiteRef to a IPatchworkAssignable

assign(address,uint256,address,uint256,u.notice: Assigns a relation to have an IPatchworkLiteRef form a LiteRef to a IPatchworkAssignable

assignBatch(address[],uint256[],address,.notice: Assign multiple fragments to a target in batch
Assign multiple fragments to a target in batch

balanceOf(string).notice: Get the balance of a given scope

balanceOfProtocol().notice: Get the current balance of the protocol

commitAssignerDelegate().notice: Commit the proposed assigner delegate module

commitProtocolFeeConfig().notice: Commits the current proposed protocol fee configuration

commitScopeFeeOverride(string).notice: Commits the current proposed protocol fee override configuration for a scope

getAssignFee(address).notice: Get the assign fee for a given fragment address

getMintConfiguration(address).notice: Get the mint configuration for a given address

getPatchFee(address).notice: Get the patch fee for a given address

getProtocolFeeConfig().notice: Get the current protocol fee configuration

getScopeFeeOverride(string).notice: Get the protocol fee override for a scope

mintBatch(address,address,bytes,uint256).notice: Mint a batch of new tokens

patchBurned(address,uint256,address).notice: Callback for when a patch is burned

patchBurned1155(address,uint256,address,.notice: Callback for when an 1155 patch is burned

patchBurnedAccount(address,address).notice: Callback for when an account patch is burned

proposeScopeFeeOverride(string,(uint256,.notice: Proposes a protocol fee override for a scope

removeBanker(string,address).notice: Remove a banker from a given scope

removeOperator(string,address).notice: Remove an operator from a scope

removeProtocolBanker(address).notice: Remove a banker from the protocol

removeWhitelist(string,address).notice: Remove an address from a scope's whitelist

setAssignFee(address,uint256).notice: Set the assign fee for a given fragment address

setMintConfiguration(address,(uint256,bo.notice: Set the mint configuration for a given address

setPatchFee(address,uint256).notice: Set the patch fee for a given address

unassignSingle(address,uint256).notice: Unassign a fragment from a target

unassignSingle(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Unassign a fragment from a target

updateOwnershipTree(address,uint256).notice: Update the ownership tree of a specific Patchwork 721

withdraw(string,uint256).notice: Withdraw an amount from the balance of a given scope

withdrawFromProtocol(uint256).notice: Withdraw a specified amount from the protocol balance
